Witness To Murder (1954) Barbara Stanwyck, George Sanders, Gary Merrill
sources.description: Witness to Murder is a 1954 American FILM NOlR crime drama directed by Roy Rowland and starring Barbara Stanwyck, George Sanders, and Gary Merrill. While the film received moderately positive reviews, it ended up as an also-ran to Alfred Hitchcock's somewhat similar Rear Window, which opened less than a month later. You can find out more about this movie from Wikipedia and there is also a review from the movie blog Where Danger Lives .

metadata.Plot: Cheryl Draper (Barbara Stanwyck) sees a murder through her bedroom window, but no one will believe her. She is stalked by the suave killer (George Sanders), who first takes steps to convince police she is crazy, but she has ally in a sympathetic policeman (Gary Merrill).
metadata.Actors: Barbara Stanwyck, George Sanders, Gary Merrill
